original_title: La ciudad de los hombres lactantes
overview: Castagno found the door that unites our world with the one of the malignant Suckling men. He decides to demonstrate it to Morales, his Psychiatrist, and at the same time to alert him of the danger they're involved. But already it is too much behind schedule: Morales sleeps over that door...
tagline: Castagno found the door that unites our world with the one of the malignant Suckling men.
title: The City of the Suckling Men
